smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'MainActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
File 'KakuTools.kt' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'
Class 'OcrRunnable' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'CaptureWindow' with '23' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'HistoryWindow' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'InstantKanjiWindow' with '16' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'InstantInfoWindow' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'KanjiChoiceWindow' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'KanjiGridView' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'KanjiCharacterView' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'MainStartFragment' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

Function loadSimilarChars is nested too deeply.
Function getMatchedEntries is nested too deeply.
Function calculateFuriganaPosition is nested too deeply.
Function onTouchEvent is nested too deeply.
Function getPotentialDeinflections is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class OcrRunnable is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class CaptureWindow is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class InstantInfoWindow is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class KanjiChoiceWindow is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of PlayStoreRatingDialogFragment.

There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of KanjiGridView.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ImgData.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class OcrResult defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class SearchInfo defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class DeinflectionInfo defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: UtilityClassWithPublicConstructor
smells.description: The class declaration is unnecessary because it only contains utility functions. An object declaration should be used instead.

instances.message: The class OcrCorrection only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class LangUtils only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.
The class PosMap only contains utility functions. Consider defining it as an object.

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `listOf("", "<", "") to ""`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `listOf("L", "") to ""`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `listOf("z", "Z") to ""`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `listOf("U") to ""`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `listOf("`", "") to ""`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `listOf("o") to ""`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `listOf("", "", "―", "‐", "—", "", "-", "_", "|") to ""`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `getResultTypeForMotionEvent(e, swappedKanji != "", drawnOnTop) to swappedKanji`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `char to 100.0`
Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `char to 0.0`

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: ca.fuwafuwa.kaku.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
ca.fuwafuwa.kaku.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.ViewGroup.LayoutParams.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

ca.fuwafuwa.kaku.Windows.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

ca.fuwafuwa.kaku.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: ARG_SECTION_NUMBER can be a `const val`.
ARG_TITLE can be a `const val`.
ARG_MESSAGE can be a `const val`.

instances.message: Private property TAG is unused.

Private function kMeansClustering is unused.
Private function calculateFuriganaPosition is unused.
Private property TAG is unused.
Private property TAG is unused.

smells.name: ForbiddenVoid
smells.description: `Unit` should be used instead of `Void`.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (deinfInfo.type and 1 != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: deinfInfo.type and 1 != 0
Parentheses in (entry.pos.contains("v1")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: entry.pos.contains("v1")
Parentheses in (deinfInfo.type and 2 != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: deinfInfo.type and 2 != 0
Parentheses in (entry.pos.contains("v5")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: entry.pos.contains("v5")
Parentheses in (deinfInfo.type and 4 != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: deinfInfo.type and 4 != 0
Parentheses in (entry.pos.contains("adj-i")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: entry.pos.contains("adj-i")
Parentheses in (deinfInfo.type and 8 != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: deinfInfo.type and 8 != 0
Parentheses in (entry.pos.contains("vk")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: entry.pos.contains("vk")
Parentheses in (deinfInfo.type and 16 != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: deinfInfo.type and 16 != 0
Parentheses in (entry.pos.contains("vs-")) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: entry.pos.contains("vs-")
Parentheses in (ordCurr >= 0x30A1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ordCurr >= 0x30A1
Parentheses in (ordCurr <= 0x30F3) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ordCurr <= 0x30F3
Parentheses in (ordCurr >= 0xFF66) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ordCurr >= 0xFF66
Parentheses in (ordCurr <= 0xFF9D) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: ordCurr <= 0xFF9D
Parentheses in (num >= 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: num >= 1
Parentheses in (num <= 20) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: num <= 20
Parentheses in ('' - 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: '' - 1
Parentheses in (num >= 21) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: num >= 21
Parentheses in (num <= 35) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: num <= 35
Parentheses in ('' - 21) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: '' - 21
Parentheses in (num >= 36) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: num >= 36
Parentheses in (num <= 50) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: num <= 50
Parentheses in ('' - 36) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: '' - 36
Parentheses in (mKanjiBoxParams.width / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: mKanjiBoxParams.width / 2
Parentheses in (kanjiBoxParams.width / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: kanjiBoxParams.width / 2
Parentheses in (maxWidth / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: maxWidth / 2
Parentheses in (minPadding * 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: minPadding * 2
Parentheses in (width + columnAndPadding) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: width + columnAndPadding
Parentheses in (currDeinflectionInfo.type and rule.type != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: currDeinflectionInfo.type and rule.type != 0
Parentheses in (wordTail == rule.from) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: wordTail == rule.from

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

instances.message: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.
